ygData.subject: Re: Wisps and Warriors (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the advice. I ll travel to CB tomorrow! Then on to Erudin to get the 14th song (yeah, I can t help but collect them all. At least it s better than
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the advice. I'll travel to CB tomorrow! Then on to Erudin to get
the 14th song (yeah, I can't help but collect them all. At least it's better
than Pokemon, Beanie Babies, Precious Moments, and Hummels!). Perhaps a stop
at Erud's Crossing to relieve a few wisps of their GLSs.

Operaman
Meandering Maestro
Innoruuk

----- Original Message -----
From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 11:40 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Wisps and Warriors (OT)


> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
> >OT: After last night I have 60+ pp in the bank. Ready to buy
> >a Dragoon Dirk. Where do you recommend I auction? Is 40pp
> >reasonable? Thanks!
>
> Thats too high on Innoruuk. We aren't one of the big servers
> but we also aren't one of the baby servers.
>
> Crushbone: Dirk price (reasonable) 15pp, (max) 20pp
> Anywhere else: Dirk price (reasonable) 30pp, (max) 35pp.
>
> I know someone who got a dirk for 5pp last night in crushbone.
> Remember they are lore items, and people farming D'Vinn have
> to sell the dirks quickly to loot another. You are doing them
> a favor by wanting to buy it (allbeit it promotes farming, but
> how are you gonna outdamage a level 24 wizard?).
>
> Harmonic Distortion, 38th 'send in the bard'.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
